name: @beatthat/safe-refs
description: Wrappers for Unity components and callbacks that handle the case that a Component's GameObject may have been destroyed.
author: larrykirschner@gmail.com

scripts.clean: rm -f *.tgz package-lock.json && cd test && npm run clean
scripts.test-install: npm run test-install:pack-unpm && npm run test-install:pack && cd test && npm run clean && npm install
scripts.test-install:pack-unpm: rm -f beatthat-unity-npm-utils*.tgz & npm pack @beatthat/unity-npm-utils && mv $(ls beatthat-unity-npm-utils*.tgz) beatthat-unity-npm-utils.tgz
scripts.test-install:pack: export pkg_file_name=$(echo ${npm_package_name} | sed -e 's/@//' | sed -e 's/\//-/') && npm pack && cp ${pkg_file_name}-${npm_package_version}.tgz ${pkg_file_name}-latest.tgz
